Class Input

java.lang.Object
Input
public class Input extends Object
Class which gets specific types of user inputs.

    • acceptCharacterInput

      public static char acceptCharacterInput(int position)
      Method to display a prompt message to user and get a character as user input.
      Parameters:
      position - The index of the fetched character.
      Returns:
      A character representing the user input.
